content.query:
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Employee]
(
    empid int NOT NULL,
    empname  NVARCHAR(50),
    gender   NVARCHAR(9)
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH (empid),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO


SELECT * FROM dbo.Employee

INSERT INTO dbo.Employee VALUES(1,'Adi','male')
